idea:
We are an ICT-based start-up working in the broad areas of education, skilling and livelihood generation.


At Lokavidya Technologies, we look at developmental issues (like education, skill development, market linkages, rural livelihood generation, etc.) with a novel bottom-up approach to understand the problems as holistically as possible; and address them through a technology solution using the powerful tool of ICT.


We understand that Technology alone cannot solve developmental problems; the right combination of field knowledge and technology know-how that we have in Team Lokavidya makes us different.

In this space, there are infinite opportunities for quality work, since technology solutions are rarely developed for the real India - the “Bottom 80%” as it is called. Challenges in this space are unique and we feel that these can be addressed through collaboration.
name: Lokavidya Technologies Pvt. Ltd.

idea:
Samadha Technologies is  a group of specialized Odoo implementation consultants with a collective
experience of more than 10 years in IT Industry especially in eCommerce, SAAS, ERP, CRM & Payment domain platforms.
Our domain expertise covers Retail, B2B, B2C, eCommerce, Manufacturing, Telecom, Textile, Vaping, Healthcare & BFSI domain
Our technological expertise encompasses eCommerce, Financial Accounting, Virtual Robots. We leverage our Odoo expertise to deliver the best value to our partners in India, US and Canada.

What we do?

--------------------------
We specialize in Software development |  implementation and Customization.  Hence, we offer Odoo-ERP Development, Customizations, Implementation, Upgrade support, transformation & Support services.
We expertise in GAP & Risk Analysis ensuring highlighting of Gaps & Risks time to time during the tenure of Implementation Odoo Integrations with Reporting tools like Jasper, Spago & different eCommerce websites like Magento, Amazon and Payment Integrations with Paypal , Authorize.Net Odoo Cloud hosting services on different Independent & Free OS systems as LINUX Odoo Business Analysis services for performing an entire BA on complex projects which require detailed level of documentation.

-----------------------------------

Why Samadha?

-----------------------------------
We have over a decade long diverse experience in Odoo implementation projects.
● A customer first attitude that always helped us provide solutions exceeding our partners expectations.
● Domain Knowledge expertise in telecom, retail, eCommerce, Manufacturing, Herbs,
Virtual Robots & Beam Technologies & Financial Accounting.
● We specialize in third party integrations which covers third party payment gateways &
eCommerce websites.
● We follow a milestone based approach for Odoo implementation that suites our
partners needs and helps them drive Change in their organization.
● Our expertise in GAP & Risk Analysis ensures highlighting of Gaps & Risks time to time
during the tenure of Implementation.
● Extensive customization & implementation experience have always ensured on-time
completion of our projects.
-------------------------------------------
name: Samadha Technologies

idea:
iKuber is a Fintech – A Digital Financial Marketplace One Stop Shop for All Financial Needs.
It offers:
 A Digitally integrated Multi-Lingual Financial Services Platform and simplified process for ease of execution (Website, M-site and Mobile App)
 Complete range of Financial Solutions across all asset-classes for customers (Individual as well as Corporate)
 Financial Advice to its customers by
o leveraging AI, ML based algos, analytical tools for doing Financial Need Analysis &
o draw up Financial Plans to achieve their objectives
 Enable Transaction execution aligned to the Investment Plan and monitor progress
• iKuber’s Digital Platform:
 Integrates with Financial Product Manufacturers
 Facilitates comprehensive Financial Planning & Guidance based on Expert Investment Research & Analysis
 Enables investing across Financial Products viz:
o Investment products: Mutual Funds, PMS, Private Equity, Corporate FD’s
o Protection & Savings products: Life, Health and General Insurance (Motor, Household, Travel etc.)
o Liability products: Home loans, Business Loans, Loan against Property, Personal loans, Vehicle loans, Education loans
• For the Customer, iKuber’s Digital Platform:
 Offers a complete Digital Customer Experience
 Is a responsive Website, M-site and Mobile Appln supported by All Browsers & Smart Phone Operating systems
 Integrates with Social Networking sites like Facebook, Twitter, Youtube, Linkedin etc.
 Assists Online Customer Relationship Management for Ease in Doing Investments
 Offer services through its Sub-Distributor Channel using its “Office-in-the-Box” online modules covering
o eLearning, Lead Management, Online Sales fulfilment, Customer Portfolio & Commission Management
o Facilitate Personalization based on Customer Profile
name: IKUBER FINANCIAL SERVICES IMF PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Bizcode Solutions is an IT Solutions Company based out of Mumbai, India, which specializes in IT solutions for Small and Medium-Sized enterprises (SMEs) from all over the world. 


OUR AIM : We want to be a game changer in the industry, by meeting all the needs of our customers by providing practical, scalable, customizable and affordable solutions. We cater to our customers in providing the best suitable solutions for their various business requirements.


Our Services include :

 Software Development

 Cloud & Web Solution

 SMS, WhatsApp solutions


Market Segment

 Manufacturing Industries

o Process Automation.

o Business Process Re-engineering

o ERP Solution

o Supporting 3rd Party ERP with innovative data collection

o Filling gaps left by 3rd Party ERP to achieve the Targeted result.

o Software and Hardware Consultants

 Gold Testing Labs

o XRF

o Assay

o Hallmarking

 Construction & Contracting Companies

 Trading Whole Sales / Retail Business Houses

 Food Items Chain Stores / Warehouse

 Spare Parts trading

 Garment wholesales / Retails

 Health Care – Hospitals

 Business Consulting

o Complete IT outsourcing

o Customized Software Development

o Human Resources, Payroll, and Administration

o Ware Houses

o Mobile Solution

o Embedded Development

o IT-enabled Services

o Remote Data Management
name: BIZCODE SOLUTIONS PVT LTD
